Query.Sql: select NHSNumber, GeneratedRecordIdentifier, StartDateHospitalProviderSpell, StartTimeHospitalProviderSpell, ReferrerCode -- Referrer code is the code of the person making the referral request FROM omop_staging.sus_APC where NHSNumber is not null

Explanation.Description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.
Records whether anaesthetic was given during Labour/ Delivery, and the type used.
Referrer code is the code of the person making the referral request.
